title: Canada begins clinical trial of experimental COVID-19 treatment using plasma from recovered individuals - The Globe and Mail
description: Canada begins clinical trial of experimental COVID-19 treatment using plasma from recovered individuals The Globe and Mail COVID-19: US conducts trials of plasma transfusions Al Jazeera English Coronavirus FAQs: Should I wear a mask? How long will schools be …
content:
A team of blood transfusion experts from across Canada is planning the worlds largest clinical trial of a potential treatment for COVID-19.
The study, which will involve 1,000 patients from across the country, will include at least 40 Canadian hospitals, and… [+6765 chars]
